ValidationRule.description: work type is required for closing a case for service delivery rt
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Sales_Ops_Delivery', TEXT(Status) = 'Closed', isblank(text( Work_Type__c )), OR ( TEXT( ResolutionCode__c ) = 'Assistance Provided', TEXT( ResolutionCode__c ) = 'Customer – no response', TEXT( ResolutionCode__c ) = 'Customer – response, no further action', TEXT( ResolutionCode__c ) = 'Feedback (Issue captured and logged)', TEXT( ResolutionCode__c ) = 'Other')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide value for Work Type.
